Let<S>3306</S> brotherly love<S>5360</S> continue<S>3306</S>.
Be<S>1950</S> not<S>3361</S> forgetful<S>1950</S> to entertain strangers<S>5381</S>: for<S>1063</S> thereby<S>1223</S> <S>5026</S> some<S>5100</S> have entertained<S>3579</S> angels<S>32</S> unawares<S>2990</S>.
Remember<S>3403</S> them that are in bonds<S>1198</S>, as<S>5613</S> bound with them<S>4887</S>; and them which suffer adversity<S>2558</S>, as<S>5613</S> being<S>5607</S> yourselves<S>846</S> also<S>2532</S> in<S>1722</S> the body<S>4983</S>.
Marriage<S>1062</S> is honourable<S>5093</S> in<S>1722</S> all<S>3956</S>, and<S>2532</S> the bed<S>2845</S> undefiled<S>283</S>: but<S>1161</S> whoremongers<S>4205</S> and<S>2532</S> adulterers<S>3432</S> God<S>2316</S> will judge<S>2919</S>.
Let your conversation<S>5158</S> be without covetousness<S>866</S>; and be content<S>714</S> with such things as ye have<S>3918</S>: for<S>1063</S> he<S>846</S> hath said<S>2046</S>, I will never<S>3364</S> leave<S>447</S> thee<S>4571</S>, nor<S>3761</S> <S>3364</S> forsake<S>1459</S> thee<S>4571</S>.
So that<S>5620</S> we<S>2248</S> may boldly<S>2292</S> say<S>3004</S>, The Lord<S>2962</S> is my<S>1698</S> helper<S>998</S>, and<S>2532</S> I will<S>5399</S> not<S>3756</S> fear<S>5399</S> what<S>5101</S> man<S>444</S> shall do<S>4160</S> unto me<S>3427</S>.
Remember<S>3421</S> them which have the rule<S>2233</S> over you<S>5216</S>, who<S>3748</S> have spoken<S>2980</S> unto you<S>5213</S> the word<S>3056</S> of God<S>2316</S>: whose<S>3739</S> faith<S>4102</S> follow<S>3401</S>, considering<S>333</S> the end<S>1545</S> of their conversation<S>391</S>. <sup>have the rule: or, are the guides</sup>
Jesus<S>2424</S> Christ<S>5547</S> the same<S>846</S> yesterday<S>5504</S>, and<S>2532</S> to day<S>4594</S>, and<S>2532</S> for<S>1519</S> ever<S>165</S>.
Be<S>4064</S> not<S>3361</S> carried about<S>4064</S> with divers<S>4164</S> and<S>2532</S> strange<S>3581</S> doctrines<S>1322</S>. For<S>1063</S> it is a good thing<S>2570</S> that the heart<S>2588</S> be established<S>950</S> with grace<S>5485</S>; not<S>3756</S> with meats<S>1033</S>, which have<S>5623</S> not<S>3756</S> profited<S>5623</S> them that have been occupied<S>4043</S> therein<S>1722</S> <S>3739</S>.
We have<S>2192</S> an altar<S>2379</S>, whereof<S>1537</S> <S>3739</S> they have<S>2192</S> no<S>3756</S> right<S>1849</S> to eat<S>5315</S> which serve<S>3000</S> the tabernacle<S>4633</S>.
For<S>1063</S> the bodies<S>4983</S> of those<S>5130</S> beasts<S>2226</S>, whose<S>3739</S> blood<S>129</S> is brought<S>1533</S> into<S>1519</S> the sanctuary<S>39</S> by<S>1223</S> the high priest<S>749</S> for<S>4012</S> sin<S>266</S>, are burned<S>2618</S> without<S>1854</S> the camp<S>3925</S>.
Wherefore<S>1352</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> also<S>2532</S>, that<S>2443</S> he might sanctify<S>37</S> the people<S>2992</S> with<S>1223</S> his own<S>2398</S> blood<S>129</S>, suffered<S>3958</S> without<S>1854</S> the gate<S>4439</S>.
Let us go forth<S>1831</S> therefore<S>5106</S> unto<S>4314</S> him<S>846</S> without<S>1854</S> the camp<S>3925</S>, bearing<S>5342</S> his<S>846</S> reproach<S>3680</S>.
For<S>1063</S> here<S>5602</S> have we<S>2192</S> no<S>3756</S> continuing<S>3306</S> city<S>4172</S>, but<S>235</S> we seek one<S>1934</S> to come<S>3195</S>.
By<S>1223</S> him<S>846</S> therefore<S>3767</S> let us offer<S>399</S> the sacrifice<S>2378</S> of praise<S>133</S> to God<S>2316</S> continually<S>1275</S>, that is<S>5123</S>, the fruit<S>2590</S> of our lips<S>5491</S> giving thanks<S>3670</S> to his<S>846</S> name<S>3686</S>. <sup>giving: Gr. confessing to</sup>
But<S>1161</S> to do good<S>2140</S> and<S>2532</S> to communicate<S>2842</S> forget<S>1950</S> not<S>3361</S>: for<S>1063</S> with such<S>5108</S> sacrifices<S>2378</S> God<S>2316</S> is well pleased<S>2100</S>.
Obey<S>3982</S> them that have the rule<S>2233</S> over you<S>5216</S>, and<S>2532</S> submit yourselves<S>5226</S>: for<S>1063</S> they<S>846</S> watch<S>69</S> for<S>5228</S> your<S>5216</S> souls<S>5590</S>, as<S>5613</S> they that must give<S>591</S> account<S>3056</S>, that<S>2443</S> they may do<S>4160</S> it<S>5124</S> with<S>3326</S> joy<S>5479</S>, and<S>2532</S> not<S>3361</S> with grief<S>4727</S>: for<S>1063</S> that<S>5124</S> is unprofitable<S>255</S> for you<S>5213</S>. <sup>have: or, guide</sup>
Pray<S>4336</S> for<S>4012</S> us<S>2257</S>: for<S>1063</S> <S>3754</S> we trust<S>3982</S> we have<S>2192</S> a good<S>2570</S> conscience<S>4893</S>, in<S>1722</S> all things<S>3956</S> willing<S>2309</S> to live<S>390</S> honestly<S>2573</S>.
But<S>1161</S> I beseech<S>3870</S> you the rather<S>4056</S> to do<S>4160</S> this<S>5124</S>, that<S>2443</S> I may be restored<S>600</S> to you<S>5213</S> the sooner<S>5032</S>.
Now<S>1161</S> the God<S>2316</S> of peace<S>1515</S>, that brought again<S>321</S> from<S>1537</S> the dead<S>3498</S> our<S>2257</S> Lord<S>2962</S> Jesus<S>2424</S>, that great<S>3173</S> shepherd<S>4166</S> of the sheep<S>4263</S>, through<S>1722</S> the blood<S>129</S> of the everlasting<S>166</S> covenant<S>1242</S>, <sup>covenant: or, testament</sup>
Make<S>2675</S> you<S>5209</S> perfect<S>2675</S> in<S>1722</S> every<S>3956</S> good<S>18</S> work<S>2041</S> to<S>1519</S> do<S>4160</S> his<S>846</S> will<S>2307</S>, working<S>4160</S> in<S>1722</S> you<S>5213</S> that which is wellpleasing<S>2101</S> in his<S>846</S> sight<S>1799</S>, through<S>1223</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> Christ<S>5547</S>; to whom<S>3739</S> be glory<S>1391</S> for<S>1519</S> ever<S>165</S> and ever<S>165</S>. Amen<S>281</S>. <sup>working: or, doing</sup>
And<S>1161</S> I beseech<S>3870</S> you<S>5209</S>, brethren<S>80</S>, suffer<S>430</S> the word<S>3056</S> of exhortation<S>3874</S>: for<S>1063</S> <S>2532</S> I have written a letter<S>1989</S> unto you<S>5213</S> in<S>1223</S> few words<S>1024</S>.
Know ye<S>1097</S> that our brother<S>80</S> Timothy<S>5095</S> is set at liberty<S>630</S>; with<S>3326</S> whom<S>3739</S>, if<S>1437</S> he come<S>2064</S> shortly<S>5032</S>, I will see<S>3700</S> you<S>5209</S>.
Salute<S>782</S> all<S>3956</S> them that have the rule<S>2233</S> over you<S>5216</S>, and<S>2532</S> all<S>3956</S> the saints<S>40</S>. They of<S>575</S> Italy<S>2482</S> salute<S>782</S> you<S>5209</S>.
Grace<S>5485</S> be with<S>3326</S> you<S>5216</S> all<S>3956</S>. Amen<S>281</S>. <sup>Written<S>1125</S> to<S>4314</S> the Hebrews<S>1445</S> from<S>575</S> Italy<S>2482</S>, by<S>1223</S> Timothy<S>5095</S>.</sup>
